snippet: Ford added touch-screen controls ahead of its competitors, but the flaws in the MyFord Touch system have hurt its reputation and its rating from Consumer Reports. It is trying again.
abstract: Ford added touch-screen controls ahead of its competitors, but the flaws in the MyFord Touch system have hurt its reputation and its rating from Consumer Reports. It is trying again.

headline.main: After Ratings Drop, Ford Reworks Touch Screens
